speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: SCENE V. Gloucester's castle.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Enter REGAN and OSWALD

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: But are my brother's powers set forth?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Ay, madam.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Himself in person there?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Madam, with much ado:

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Your sister is the better soldier.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Lord Edmund spake not with your lord at home?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: No, madam.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: What might import my sister's letter to him?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: I know not, lady.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: 'Faith, he is posted hence on serious matter.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: It was great ignorance, Gloucester's eyes being out,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: To let him live: where he arrives he moves

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: All hearts against us: Edmund, I think, is gone,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: In pity of his misery, to dispatch

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: His nighted life: moreover, to descry

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: The strength o' the enemy.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: I must needs after him, madam, with my letter.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Our troops set forth to-morrow: stay with us;

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: The ways are dangerous.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: I may not, madam:

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: My lady charged my duty in this business.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Why should she write to Edmund? Might not you

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Transport her purposes by word? Belike,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Something--I know not what: I'll love thee much,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Let me unseal the letter.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Madam, I had rather--

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I know your lady does not love her husband;

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I am sure of that: and at her late being here

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: She gave strange oeillades and most speaking looks

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: To noble Edmund. I know you are of her bosom.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: I, madam?

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I speak in understanding; you are; I know't:

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Therefore I do advise you, take this note:

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: My lord is dead; Edmund and I have talk'd;

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: And more convenient is he for my hand

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Than for your lady's: you may gather more.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: If you do find him, pray you, give him this;

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: And when your mistress hears thus much from you,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I pray, desire her call her wisdom to her.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: So, fare you well.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: If you do chance to hear of that blind traitor,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Preferment falls on him that cuts him off.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Would I could meet him, madam! I should show

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: What party I do follow.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Fare thee well.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Exeunt
